content: growing from this free mini crochet leaf motif pattern are all the scenes of seasons passing green buds peeking out shyly to the beckoning of a springtime sun overgrown and overfed foliage baking beneath a summer sky and crispy leaves falling to rest wearily on the ground as the autumn wind sings the landscape back to sleep no matter what day of year it is it s always the perfect time to celebrate the magic of the changing seasons with this free mini crochet leaf motif pattern this leaf motif pattern is compatible with our strawberry bookmark set mushroom bookmark & garland set pumpkin bookmark & garland set and acorn bookmark & garland set **pattern information ** this free crochet leaf motif pattern has a difficulty rating of **easy** the finished dimensions of each leaf motif is **1 5 inches height by 1 5 inches width ** ∗ the finished length of the example bookmark string is 12 inches but this pattern includes instructions for customizing your bookmark to any length that you desire ∗finished dimensions are calculated from a model using medium weight yarn a size h-8 5 mm crochet hook the yu/yo method and the following gauge **18 single_crochet x 21 row = 4 inches** **supplies ** * size h-8 5 mm crochet hook * medium 4 weight yarn in 1 color * green example uses big twist value forest green * yarn needle * scissors * stitch markers optional **terminology ** this free mini crochet leaf motif pattern uses english us terminology * st sts = stitch stitches * chain = chain stitch * slip_stitch = slip_stitch * single_crochet = single_crochet * half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet * double_crochet = double_crochet * treble_crochet = treble_crochet please note that this pattern is written so that each crochet stitch abbreviation is attached to a number such as 1sc 2sc etc this number denotes how many of that stitch is to be worked into the same stitch in other words 1sc = one single_crochet whereas 2sc = two single_crochet worked into one stitch also known as an increase **follow us for more crochet content and amigurumi adventures ** https //virkadia com/ | blog https //virkadia etsy com | etsy https //www instagram
